page.title: 2008â09 Georgia Tech Yellow Jackets men's basketball team

revisions.rev:
{{NCAATeamSeason |Mode=Basketball |Year=2008-09 |Prev year=2007-08 |Next year=2009-10 |Team=Georgia Tech Yellow Jackets |Image=Georgia Tech Outline Interlocking logo.svg |Conference=Atlantic Coast Conference |Division= |ShortConference=ACC |CoachRank= |APRank= |Record=12-19 |ConfRecord=2-14 |HeadCoach=[[Paul Hewitt]] |AsstCoach1=John O'Connor |AsstCoach2=Charlton Young |AsstCoach3=Peter Zaharis |StadiumArena=[[Alexander Memorial Coliseum]] |Champion= |BowlTourney= |BowlTourneyResult= }} {{2008-09 ACC men's basketball standings}} The '''2008â09 Georgia Tech Yellow Jackets men's basketball team''' plays [[basketball]] for the [[Georgia Institute of Technology|Georgia Tech]] [[Georgia Tech Yellow Jackets|Yellow Jackets]]. In 2007-08, they went 11-10 (4-4 ACC). [[Georgia Institute of Technology]]'s basketball program is one of the most popular and successful college basketball programs in the nation. The [[Georgia Tech Yellow Jackets|Yellow Jackets]] have been to 2 [[NCAA Men's Division I Basketball Championship|NCAA Final Fours]] and have won 3 [[Atlantic Coast Conference|ACC Championships]] in the past 25 years. The program is most well known for its famous alumni, such as [[Chris Bosh]], [[Stephon Marbury]], [[Kenny Anderson]], [[John Salley]], [[Mark Price]], and [[Jarrett Jack]]. [[Bobby Cremins]] built the Georgia Tech basketball program from the basement up and passed the torch to current head coach [[Paul Hewitt]]. Hewitt's teams feed off pressure defense and fast-paced transition offenses. ==Roster== Information from [http://ramblinwreck.cstv.com/sports/m-baskbl/mtt/geot-m-baskbl-mtt.html 2008-09 roster], subject to change. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" | border="2" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 95%;" |- |'''Name''' |'''Number''' |'''Position''' |'''Height''' |'''Weight''' |'''Year''' |'''Hometown''' |- |Lewis Clinch |0 |G |6-3 |196 |Senior |[[Cordele, Georgia]] |- |Iman Shumpert |1 |G |6-5 |200 |Freshman |[[Oak Park, Illinois]] |- |Maurice Miller |3 |G |6-2 |185 |Sophomore |[[Memphis, Tennessee]] |- |Nick Foreman |4 |G |6-3 |197 |Freshman |[[Bellaire, Texas]] |- |Lance Storrs |10 |G |6-5 |220 |Sophomore |[[Decatur, Georgia]] |- |Sam Shew |11 |F |6-5 |190 |Freshman |[[Decatur, Georgia]] |- |Bassirou Dieng |12 |F-C |6-9 |220 |Senior |[[Dakar, Senegal]] |- |D'Andre Bell |13 |G/F |6-6 |220 |Senior |[[Los Angeles, California]] |- |Ty Anderson |14 |G |6-4 |200 |Junior |[[Watkinsville, Georgia]] |- |Gary Cage |24 |G |6-1 |190 |Senior |[[Atlanta, Georgia]] |- |[[Gani Lawal]] |31 |F |6-9 |233 |Sophomore |[[Norcross, Georgia]] |- |Derek Craig |33 |G |6-4 |180 |Freshman |[[Spring, Texas]] |- |Brad Sheehan |34 |C |7-0 |233 |RS Sophomore |[[Latham, New York]] |- |Zachery Peacock |35 |F |6-8 |240 |Junior |[[Miami, Florida]] |- |Alade Aminu |44 |F |6-10 |225 |Senior |[[Stone Mountain, Georgia]] |- |} ==Schedule== {| class="wikitable" !
